cause.description:
American YouthWorks' programs include: a 2 campus charter school, Casa Verde Builders, Environmental Corps, Computer Corps, The RGK Downtown Youth Center for Health, Counseling, Supportive Employment and Entrepreneurial Initiatives. ***********************************
Environmental Corps provides low cost park support work for Austin and Texas. We have a major focus on ecological aspect of our work, which includes mainly trail-building and invasive species removal.
Casa Verde Builders gives high school students a chance to spend half their day (and all day during summers) building low-cost green housing in working class neighborhoods of Austin. It is one of the few programs in the country working to demonstrate the compatibility between affordable housing and high caliber green building techniques.
1. Mixing community service with practical environmental work.
2. Mixing affordable housing with green building standards.
3. Quantum learning
cause.mission: Green service learning and volunteerism; and alternative learning programs.
cause.name: American Youthworks-Environmental Corps-Casa Verde
